channel.title: 2 Questions!
channel.description:
1. How will Jagex contact me if they need to? I really need an answer on this, i still couldn't get correct answer on this, =/.
2. I heard that if i didn't agree to them terms, they can't sue me for making private servers? Does it also count if my nephew made the account, but that i only played on it sometimes?

item.title: 2 Questions!
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

Unless your server gets massive, your fine.

Read full topic

they will never find that out unless you announce you e-mail and jagex somehow sees it and then searchs threw its 10million memebers which i don’t see it ever happening

item.title: 2 Questions!
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:5, topic:353125”][quote author=freakinlost link=topic=449440.msg3297378#msg3297378 date=1281039181]
they won’t know its you only way they can attack you is going threw mopar and attacking each user which they can’t and won’t they will be like “oh this person plays this stuff im disapointed” they can’t do anything unless they have proof of something you did was breaking the terms they have implemented

sorry for bad grammar idc about that stuff…
[/quote]
Yeah, but now the main problem is, how will they contact me?![/quote]

all you need to know is if you got no way of them contacting you they won’t
